summary: Marcus Vindicus is a Imperial Tank w/ Restoration, Heavy Armor and Two-Handed skills.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][/size][/center][center][size=5]First Mod so any Bug Reports/Suggestions are Appreciated :)
[/size][size=4]Marcus Vindicus is an former Imperial Legate, but left the Legion so he could travel without the stress of leadership. He is equipped with Imperial Heavy Armor without without a helmet and the Headsman's Axe. These can be changed, but he prefers to fight with a two-handed weapon and heavy armor.
[/size]
[size=5][b]Notes[/b][/size]
[size=4]-He is very skilled in Restoration, Heavy Armor and Two-Handed.[/size]
[size=4]-He will not affect your stealth meter. He is stealth user friendly.[/size]
[size=4]-No mods required, but some recommended.[/size]
[size=4]-You can find him in the Sleeping Giant Inn.[/size]

[size=5][b]Mods Recommended
[/b][/size][size=4][b]Perfect Legionnaire-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6085/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6085/?[/url]
SkySight Skins (Male)-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?
[/url]aMidianBorn Book of Silence-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?
[/url][/b][/size]-[b][u][size=5]Thank You So Much For Downloading![/size][/u][/b][/center]
author: Secrets of Skyrim
